Package AppointmentOutcome.Controller

Class AppointmentOutcomeController

java.lang.Object
AppointmentOutcome.Controller.AppointmentOutcomeController
public class AppointmentOutcomeController extends Object
Controller for managing AppointmentOutcome entities, providing utility methods for retrieving, creating, and filtering appointment outcomes.

    • getAppointmentOutcomeByAppointmentId

      public static List<AppointmentOutcome> getAppointmentOutcomeByAppointmentId(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves appointment outcomes by a specific appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentOutcome objects associated with the given appointment ID.

    • createAppointmentOutcome

      public static AppointmentOutcome createAppointmentOutcome(AppointmentOutcome appointmentOutcome)
      Creates a new appointment outcome and adds it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      appointmentOutcome - The AppointmentOutcome object to be created.
      Returns:
      The created AppointmentOutcome object.

    • getAppointmentOutcomeNotDispensed

      public static List<AppointmentOutcome> getAppointmentOutcomeNotDispensed()
      Retrieves a list of appointment outcomes that have prescriptions not yet dispensed.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentOutcome objects associated with prescriptions marked as "pending."
